function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of indoor surfaces and air with COVID-19 virus","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, using air filtration systems, and regular disinfection of surfaces","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air collectors, and surface disinfectants","People":"Patients, occupants of the homes, and anyone entering the contaminated environment","Owner":"Health authorities, building owners, and occupants of the homes"},{"Description":"High viral loads found in specific areas like toilets, bathrooms, and staff areas","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to COVID-19 in these high-contamination areas","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough cleaning and disinfection of these areas, use of protective equipment, and minimizing time spent in these areas","Technologies":"Disinfectants, cleaning equipment, and personal protective equipment","People":"Cleaning staff, healthcare workers, and occupants of the building","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building owners, and cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 within a community due to shared building infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission among occupants of the building","Mitigation":"Improved building ventilation, regular cleaning of shared areas, and maintaining physical distancing within the building","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air ventilation systems, and building management protocols","People":"Occupants of the building, building management, and healthcare authorities","Owner":"Building management and healthcare authorities"}]}
